pullRequest.title: More routing options for Fenzo/Kube scheduler
pullRequest.bodyText: With this PR, we can route using an application name, capacity group, tier or job type.

commit.message: More routing options for Fenzo/Kube scheduler

nodes.bodyText: Can you document the intended behavior of this method? I can see it being confusing due to having to figure out how multiple feature guards are composed together.
Can you write a test with common cases for this predicate?
